LanguageData.JRWIschigualastia.label: Ischigualastia
LanguageData.JRWIschigualastia.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #024662-1962 [ISCHIGUALASTIA JENSENI] CODENAME: LUNA-VALLE >092
A chunky species of dicynodont synapsid that has large, beak like teeth and a leathery, chocolate hide. Their teeth are serrated for shredding tough ferns, but when confronted these once gentle giants can turn on a dime and shred flesh like a knife. They make decent pack animals and have been described as having the intelligence of an elephant,, being able to recognise their handlers and form bonds.
LanguageData.JRWIschigualastia.tools.head.label: head
